thread.title: I bonded with Prabhas during Baahubali: Madhu Sneha
thread.title_full: I bonded with Prabhas during Baahubali: Madhu Sneha - The Times of India

author: Sunayana Suresh
title: I bonded with Prabhas during Baahubali: Madhu Sneha
text:
Model-turned-actress Madhu Sneha was in town recently for a gig, during which she caught up with us. The actress, who was seen in the song Manohari in Baahubali, is upbeat about her South Indian innings and hopes to work in more films here.
She says, "During the shoot, I got to bond with Prabhas and he has been a good friend ever since. It has been lovely to have people recognize me as the Manohari girl." Madhu, who lives in Mumbai, also adds that she is a fan of Sudeep's work. "He is such a fabulous actor, which is no wonder why Rajamouli sir requested him for a cameo after his role in Makkhi. I admire how he did such a brilliant job in Makkhi," she says.
